name: yeti
short_description:
This is the project page for Yeti aka YetiCode which was retired on January 14th 2012.
Most of the code from Yeti has moved into the Feisty Meow® Concerns Ltd codebase, available at http://feistymeow.org for your enjoyment.

====

yeti is a powerful script library that uses bash and perl.  recent refactoring and better organization led to wonderfulness, and this convinced us to give yeti its own voice on sourceforge.  the yeti is strong, but not entirely odor free.
summary: bash and perl scripts from a yeti
